item.title: Git Explained by DEV Community
item.description: There are many Git tutorials that explain how it works, what it is, the commands, the best practices … and so on, so instead of doing a new Git tutorial, I’m putting in the ones I’d recommend to my peers using Dev Community articles. ðŸ˜„ It is important to mention that these are not all, there are many more, but among those that I had the opportunity to read and found interesting, I added them to the list.
